section.title: About legends
section.para: You can create, edit, clone, delete, show details and translate legends to make the maps you're setting up for your users meaningful.

note.para: Continuous legends must consist of legend items that end and start with the same value, for example: 0-50 and 50-80. Do not set legend items like this: 0-50 and 51-80. This will create gaps in your legend.
